backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types (Song, VoiceSample, VoicePersona, Cover, LyricsRequest) and CRUD operations for uploading songs, voice samples, creating personas and covers, and managing lyrics-based generation requests with persistent storage using Maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module providing a no-op migration function that preserves the existing actor state during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: debugging library saving mechanism and adding error handling/logging to the library save workflow, with associated test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, and configuration files, describing their functionality and integration points.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with warm gradient palette for music production aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing multi-step workflows (cover/generation modes), view navigation (create/library/personas), persona selection, and orchestrating the complete user journey from mode selection through processing completion with automatic library navigation.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Audio player component with play/pause controls, seek slider, volume control, time display, and song metadata display using the useAudioPlayer hook.
frontend/src/components/DownloadButton.t: Download button component that retrieves audio bytes from ExternalBlob, creates a downloadable file with correct MIME type and extension based on selected format (MP3/WAV), and handles download state with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/FormatSelector.t: Radio button component for selecting audio download format (MP3 or WAV) with visual labels showing compression and quality differences.
frontend/src/components/GenerationMode.t: Component for lyrics-based song generation mode that accepts lyrics input, optional style prompts with keyword suggestions, and submits requests to the backend actor with voice sample ID.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with header, navigation tabs (Create/Library/Personas), background styling with waveform image, and GitHub link.
frontend/src/components/Library.tsx: Displays user's song library with playback controls, download options in MP3/WAV formats, social sharing, and integrates AudioPlayer for in-app playback.
frontend/src/components/LyricsInput.tsx: Textarea component for entering song lyrics with character count validation (minimum 20 characters) and submit button for generating songs.
frontend/src/components/ModeSelector.tsx: Initial mode selection screen with two cards: 'Cover a Song' for uploading existing tracks and 'Generate from Lyrics' for AI composition from text.
frontend/src/components/Personas.tsx: Manages voice personas with create, delete, and select functionality. Displays a list of saved voice samples with dialog for creating new personas using VoiceInput component.
frontend/src/components/ProcessingStatus: Displays processing progress for either cover creation or song generation workflows. Shows stage-by-stage progress with animations and calls onComplete callback when processing finishes.
frontend/src/components/SocialShare.tsx: Provides social sharing functionality for songs to Facebook and YouTube. Uses dropdown menu with Web Share API fallback and opens YouTubeUploadDialog for YouTube uploads.
frontend/src/components/SongUpload.tsx: Handles song file upload with metadata (title, artist) input. Validates audio file types (MP3, WAV, M4A), shows upload progress, and calls backend uploadSong method.
frontend/src/components/StyleKeywords.ts: Displays clickable badge keywords for music style suggestions (genres, effects, tempo). Provides predefined keywords like '808', 'trap', 'reverb' that can be added to lyrics/style inputs.
frontend/src/components/VoiceInput.tsx: Wrapper component providing toggle between recording and uploading voice samples. Renders either VoiceRecorder or VoiceUpload based on selected mode.
frontend/src/components/VoiceRecorder.ts: Records audio from microphone with visual feedback (duration, audio levels). Uploads recorded audio as voice sample to backend and calls onComplete with sample ID and blob.
frontend/src/components/VoiceUpload.tsx: React component for uploading voice samples (MP3, WAV, M4A up to 50MB) with file validation, progress tracking, and integration with the backend actor's uploadVoiceSample method.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeUploadDia: Dialog component for configuring and uploading songs to YouTube with title, description, and privacy settings; currently shows a placeholder UI with instructions for manual upload since OAuth2 integration is not implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Custom hook providing audio playback controls (play/pause, seek, volume) with state management for current time, duration, loading status, and event handling for an HTML5 Audio element.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerationStatus.t: Hook that simulates multi-stage song generation progress (analyzing, composing, synthesizing, mixing, mastering) with smooth progress updates and returns the generated cover ID upon completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useProcessingStatus.t: Hook that orchestrates multi-stage audio processing with progress tracking, creates a dummy audio file, and calls the backend actor to save the cover with the final mix.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching covers, lyrics requests, user library, and managing voice personas with mutations for create/delete operations. Includes polling logic for pending/processing lyrics requests and automatic refetching for user library every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecorder.ts: Custom React hook for browser-based voice recording using MediaRecorder and Web Audio API. Provides recording controls, duration tracking, real-time audio level monitoring via frequency analysis, and returns recorded audio as a Blob.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space. Defines design tokens for colors, spacing, and applies base styles to body element.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication. Renders the main App component with necessary providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom colors using OKLCH, border radius variables, custom animations for accordions, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining an AI voice cover app that must be free, with architectural notes about voice cloning, audio processing, and persona management. Documents a known issue where songs are not being saved to the library after generation.
